author: zhaobenny
description: Human-like Discord reacts to messages powered by OpenAI
install_msg:
Quick startup guide: 
 1) Set (preferably paid account) OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY 
 2) Use [p]aiemoteowner to see owner cmds, add a whitelisted channel as server admin using [p]aiemote allow <#channel> 
 3) Have users optin using [p]aiemote optin
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. With user consent, chat messages will be forwarded to OpenAI, to produce responses. For further details, please consult: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy and relevant third-party privacy policies.
